name: 10-in-1 foldable fruit market bags
sizes_available: folded: 6.5 inches diameter, about 2 inches thick open, flat, relaxed: 12 x 14 inches
notes:
*these no sew foldable fruit market bags are a 10-in-1 pattern  (apple, lemon, orange, grapefruit, cantaloupe, watermelon, kiwi, coconut, dragonfruit, peach) and were designed for a live quick cal.  you can join the **free cal starting july 31 - aug 2nd, 2024 for 3 days** (releasing 1 pattern part per day). the pattern will include 3 live video tutorials for each section of the pattern and extra support. *

> the free cal's pattern includes ads.

live video tutorials will be at 12pm, pt on [youtube][1] for
part 1: first circle - july 31st, 2024
part 2: main bag body - aug 1st, 2024
part 3: second circle and connection to the first circle - aug 2nd, 2024
